Package br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.modifiers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmountModifier
    Modifies quantitative attributes such as maximum health and energy, either adding/subtracting or replacing their values.
    InventoryModifier
    Modifies the player's inventory.
    Modifier
    A Modifier is used by scenes, items and events to affect the player's status in some way, such as increasing maximum health and modifying the inventory.
    PathModifier
    Modifies the player's path in the story.
    QuestModifier
    Modifies quests of the player according to the specified operation.
    UnlockModifier
    Marks items as unlocked for the current profile.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AmountModifier.ModifiedAttribute  
    InventoryModifier.ItemOperation  
    QuestModifier.OperationType
    The operation type determines which kind of actions will be taken and which attributes are necessary or optional.
